name: Symposier
overview:
Symposier, is a worldwide, virtual community exclusively for physicians where doctors generate all information and content.

This website is free for practicing physicians and allows each of them to be in contact with other doctors worldwide. The website’s tools allow doctors to:

Connect with medical professionals around the world and seize the collective experiences and knowledge to the benefit of their own patients.

  • Share and discuss difficult clinical cases
  • Rate and post new ideas for treatments and procedures
  • Join and participate in discussion panels

Establish common-interest groups to build a collaboration network

  • Create public or private groups
  • Join previously-created common-interest groups
  • Leverage synergies with analog societies or other groups around the world

Learn about local or international medical events

  • Get information on future events
  • Post information on future events organized by you
  • Share your experience on current events on real time
  • Exchange points of view on past events

Consult: Seize our library of over 4000 videos and 2000 medical-specific images

  • Search videos and images through keywords
  • Share videos and images of your day-to-day practice
  • Seize this information for your presentations
  • Browse and share this materials with your patients

Publish: Share with the worldwide medical communityâ€¦

  • Videos and images of your day-to-day practice
  • Clinical studies
  • Symposiums and conferences
  • Show-and-tell materials for patients
  • Rate contents posted by other colleagues

Symposier Connect is the collaboration platform where key communities around the physicianâ€™s realm are be able to post links, content, recorded webcasts and surveys to the entire professional community or to targeted physicians only in a subscription base, and within a certified environment.
